meanings.definition: Cause extreme fear or distress to
meanings.sent1: The loud thunder terrorises my dog during storms.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie really terrorises young children.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten terrorises the big dog by chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The haunted house terrorises visitors with spooky surprises.
meanings.sent5: The ghost story terrorises the campers around the fire at night.

meanings.sent1: The bully terrorises the other kids on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The dictator terrorises the citizens into submission.
meanings.sent3: The strict teacher terrorises the students with pop quizzes.
meanings.sent4: The aggressive boss terrorises employees with constant criticism.
meanings.sent5: The mafia boss terrorises the town with his criminal activities.
